content:
With the items you have listed, here's one way you could attempt to retrieve the lost tennis ball:

1. Create a retrieval tool: Using the ball of wool, stick one end of it to the other tennis ball and use the honey to secure it in place. This will create a sticky ball on a string.
2. Lower the retrieval tool: Place the cardboard box under the bed and use it to support the other end of the wool. Then, slowly lower the sticky ball under the bed to see if it can pick up the lost tennis ball.
3. Retrieve the ball: If the sticky ball picks up the lost tennis ball, slowly lift it back out. If not, you can try moving the bed slightly or using the broom to help guide the retrieval tool to the lost ball.

Note: Keep in mind that the honey may be difficult to clean up and may attract insects, so use caution when using this method.
